reviewText: Total fabrication and a fantastic tissue of deception and lies.
This is entirely false. No black American soldiers liberated Buchenwald or Dachau.

A story largely untold about the segregation of a people who are called upon to serve as fodder in a world war.  The 761st tank battalion liberate the oppressed while still being oppressed at home.  The United States treated these liberators in the same manner as they did after their heroic deeds.  Shame!
